title: Falshood in friendship, or vnions vizard: or VVolues in lambskins 1. Discouering the errors in vniust leagues. 2. That no subiect ought to arme himselfe against his king for what pretence soeuer. 3. An aduertisement to those fewe of the nobilitie which take part with infamie.
author: L. T. A., fl. 1592.
publisher: Printed [by John Charlewood] for Nathaniell Fosbroke,
